data.name: Super Time Force Ultra
data.detailed_description: Super Time Force Ultra is an action-packed platformer with a time-travelling twist! You’re in control of time itself, bending and stretching it to your advantage on the battlefield. Rewind time and choose when to jump back into the action, teaming-up with your past selves in a unique single-player co-op experience! Take control of up to 19 unique characters, and battle across 6 different time periods, from the long-ago past to the far-away future.

data.short_description: Super Time Force Ultra is an insane platformer filled with robots and dinosaurs and fun and time travel... sometimes all at the same time!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Japanese
